item.title: I sent ChatGPT Agent out to shop for me
item.description: Think of OpenAI’s new ChatGPT Agent as a day-one intern who’s incredibly slow at every task but will eventually get the job done. Well… most of the job. Or… at least part of it. Usually. It’s been one

item.title: Right-wing orgs put pro-Palestinian students on an ICE ‘hit list’
item.description: For nearly two years, students at Columbia University have warned that they’re being targeted - and put in serious danger - by right-wing Zionist organizations like Canary Mission and Betar US. Canary

item.title: To make Ironheart feel tactile, the show’s creative team had to get on the same page
item.description: In Disney Plus’ Ironheart series, a young genius with an uncanny knack for building armored suits finds herself plunged into a shady, criminal underworld that gives her a chance to really show off her

item.title: ICEBlock isn’t ‘completely anonymous’
item.description: The developer of ICEBlock, an iOS app for anonymously reporting sightings of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officials, promises that it “ensures user privacy by storing no personal data.
